comments.body: I added an entry point in this patch due to an issue with an executable file which was causing the build to fail

I found two different requirements folders for this repo
- one in the main rastervision repo https://github.com/psortos/staged-recipes/tree/add-rastervision-core/recipes/rastervision-core 
- another in the pypi pacakge for rastervision-core https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/40/d0/4ff1c4c5b31b443deeffff1ce48f5bf03f979575e4b8726b121062180d8a/rastervision_core-0.13.1.tar.gz 
This requirements removes some of the version requirements which were creating conflicts

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@+mask-to-polygons==0.0.2
+opencv-python
\ No newline at end of file
diff --git a/setup.py b/setup.py
index 6bcd880..3b8dd4b 100644
